content: sock as i do you can repeat row 1 2 until the work measures 3 /7 5 cm for zero ease lengthwise gusset begins at minute mark 16 40 3 gusset - 1 increase row sl 1 k1 m1l k to the last 2 sts m1r k to the end turn 28 32 36 40 46 48 sts gusset increase row begins at minute mark 17 20 2 sl 1 p to the end turn 2-color note break body- - repeat row 1 2 an additional 5 5 5 5 4 5 more times 38 42 46 50 color yarn join toe-color 54 58 sts yarn at the beginning of the heel section heel begins at minute mark 18 53 4 heel - - count over 19 21 23 25 27 29 sts from the end place a locking st marker after that number of sts this marker indicates the center of the heel 1 k to the marker k 8 kfb k1 w&t heel short row begin at hey you- minute mark 20 21 did you love this freebie considering 2 p 19 pfb p1 w&t sending me a ko-fi any little bit helps me be able to continue to make fun freebies 3 k 17 kfb k1 w&t https //ko-fi com/knitoriousshe 4 p 15 pfb p1 w&t if you re on social media 5 k 13 kfb k1 w&t i d love to see what you come up with tag me 6 p 11 pfb p1 w&t #$%&#% @knitoriousshe 7 k 9 kfb k1 w&t #knitoriousshe she #skimmersocks 8 p 7 pfb p1 w&t 3 9 k to the end of the needle working the wraps together with the sts when you come to them turn pick up wraps begins at minute mark 27 11 10 sl 1 p to the end of the needle working the wraps together with the sts when you come to them turn 11 sl 1 k to 11 13 15 17 19 21 sts past the m ssk turn heel decreases begin at minute mark 31 06 12 sl 1 p to 11 13 15 17 19 21 past the m p2tog turn 13 *sl 1 k1 ** repeat from * to ** to 10 12 14 16 18 20 past the m sl 1 ssk turn - repeat row 12 13 until all the extra sts have been worked 24 28 32 36 40 44 sts 14 sl 1 k to m this is the new beginning of the round 2-color note break the toe- color yarn join body-color ribbing begins at minute mark 36 06 yarn at the beginning of the 5 ribbing - ribbing section - switch to the smaller sized needles k to the end of the heel pick up and k 1 st in each slip_stitch down to the held sts on the st holder k held sts pick up and k 1 st in each slip_stitch back up to the heel k the heel back to
